name: Norman HIRSCHFELD, Petitioner v. PENNSYLVANIA COURTS and Department of Corrections, Respondents

parties: Norman HIRSCHFELD, Petitioner v. PENNSYLVANIA COURTS and Department of Corrections, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 16th day of February, 2012, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus and/or Extraordinary Relief is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
38 A.3d 769
Norman HIRSCHFELD, Petitioner v. PENNSYLVANIA COURTS and Department of Corrections, Respondents.
No. 94 EM 2011.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Feb. 16, 2012.
